metadata.feature_description: Handles module installation, uninstallation, and version upgrades through manifest configuration.

steps.expected: Extensions page should load with list of installed extensions
steps.actual: Extensions page loaded successfully showing Installed Extensions and Available Extensions tabs

steps.expected: Library extensions should be displayed including Evoq.PersonaBar.UI
steps.actual: Libraries filter applied successfully, Evoq.PersonaBar.UI visible in list with version 10.1.1

steps.action: Click on Evoq.PersonaBar.UI extension to view details
steps.expected: Extension details page should open showing Package Information
steps.actual: Extension details page opened correctly showing: Extension Type: Library, Name: Evoq.PersonaBar.UI, Version: 10.01.01, Owner: DNN, Organization: DNN Corp., URL: http://www.dnnsoftware.com, Email: support@dnnsoftware.com

steps.action: Click on License tab in extension details
steps.actual: License tab displayed showing DotNetNuke copyright (c) 2002-2018 by DNN Corporation, All Rights Reserved. Accept License checkbox present.

steps.action: Click on Release Notes tab in extension details
steps.expected: Release notes information should be displayed
steps.actual: Release Notes tab displayed with message: 'There are no release notes for this version.'

steps.action: Click Install Extension button on Extensions page
steps.expected: Install Extension wizard should open with file upload interface
steps.actual: Install Extension wizard opened successfully showing: 'Upload Extension Package' step (1 of 5), drag-and-drop file upload area, Cancel button (enabled), Next button (disabled until file uploaded)

steps.expected: List of available extensions should be displayed with install options
steps.actual: Available Extensions tab displayed showing Google Tag Manager Connector (version 10.1.1) with Install and Download buttons

observations: Code review confirms azureCompatible is set to 'true' in the manifest (Evoq.PersonaBar.UI.dnn), but this setting is not visible in the UI extension details.
Dependencies defined in manifest (DNN Core 08.00.00, Dnn.PersonaBar.UI 01.00.00, DotNetNuke.Professional) are not displayed in the extension details UI - they are only validated during installation.
Fresh installation on DNN 8.0/9.0 cannot be tested as extension is already installed. Would require a clean DNN installation.
Upgrade from version 1.0 to 2.0 cannot be tested as there is no older version installed. The manifest shows upgradeVersionsList contains '01.00.00,01.05.00'.
Uninstallation process cannot be tested as it would potentially break the system. The Uninstall.SqlDataProvider script exists to clean up stored procedures.
File cleanup on uninstall cannot be verified without performing actual uninstallation. The manifest includes a Cleanup component for version 01.03.00.
Azure compatibility mode testing requires an Azure environment which is not available.
Assembly registration (Evoq.PersonaBar.UI.dll, Evoq.PersonaBar.Library.dll) is defined in manifest but not visible in UI for verification.
Test with missing dependencies would require manually removing required packages which could break the system.
